title: Ormosisdotcom
author: Ormosisdotcom
content: Click here to purchase reviews for your business or visit Ormosis.com for other services[/color]Did you know that 52% of customers will not buy if a business has less than a four-star rating?☛ Read more astonishing statistics about online reviews. Positive reviews can immensely help your business. Whether you own a restaurant, a store, a studio, e-commerce or another company, we can help you increase your sales. According to studies, a one-star increase in rating can lead to a 5% to 9% increase in revenue. [Source] Why should I purchase fake reviews?We write reviews tailored to your business and your products. When purchasing from us, you can either write your own reviews or let us write them for you. Our copywriters can do research on your products/services and provide reviews that are unique and relevant to your business.Our reviews are indistinguishable from real ones. To further increase the credibility of the reviews, you can choose custom parameters such as delivery dates, gender and stars. If you don't include any preference, we will deliver the reviews with settings optimized for your target audience. Why reviews are crucial for your businessSEO-optimized reviews can improve search rankings. That is especially important for local businesses or Amazon and eBay merchants. Any business can benefit from positive reviews, as they will increase brand trust and raise conversion rates.Roughly 9% of Google’s entire search algorithm is driven by review signals like those you find on Facebook, Google or Trustpilot. These review signals focus on review velocity, quality and quantity. In other words, high-quality reviews will improve your rankings in search results.91% of shoppers trust online reviews as much as a recommendation from their friends and family. We can help you build, preserve or restore your online reputation very quickly. Let us take care of your online reputation, so you can do what you do best: making money. Which kind of reviews do you provide?We can provide positive online reviews for most websites. If it's on the internet, we can do it. Below you can find a small list of supported websites. For a complete list, please refer to the website.Google reviews (Worldwide)Tripadvisor reviews (Worldwide)Amazon reviews (.com only)GlassDoor reviews (US only)Feefo reviews (Worldwide)Expedia reviews (Worldwide)Trustpilot reviews (Worldwide)Facebook reviews (Worldwide)CustomerLobby reviews (Worldwide)Walmart reviews (US only)Yelp reviews (Worldwide)BBB reviews (US only)DisclaimerPlease note that we do not endorse scammers or fraudsters. Our service is geared towards genuine business owners struggling with negative online reviews or not having enough reviews. Everybody makes mistakes. We give existing companies a second chance and help new businesses skyrocket their growth rate.We do not sell negative reviews. We are never going to harm anyone's business - whether it's one of your competitors or your brother-in-law. You can only purchase reviews for your own business, unless you are a reseller. We accept resellers and give them superior profit margins. If you want an opportunity to make more money, we can provide you with all the tools you need. ContactsFeel free to message us using any of the contact methods listed below. Thank you.Email: hello@ormosis.comTelegram: @OrmosisBotDiscord: Ormosis#5344Live chat: ormosis.comBitcointalk users get a 10% discount on their first order. Simply post "DISCOUNT PLEASE" below and you will receive a PM containing your promo code.

comments.author: Accardo
comments.body: QuotePlease note that we do not endorse scammers or fraudsters. Our service is geared towards genuine business owners struggling with negative online reviews or not having enough reviewsThings should be balanced at some point in the cooperate world or the internet, I know it's a shady place, but not to this point, selling fake reviews and claiming to Target only genuine companies sounds really unique. Genuine companies need genuine reviews that will stick. Does your service stick on Trustpilot? Dont think so, because your site doesn't have a single review on there. However, probably, the scam and fraudulent people are your target audience and you can't resist it, because how on Earth will you detect them since you want sales too. And the only way a genuine company will need a fake review is for black hat purposes, to hunt their competitors down. Good you outruled such a service, but it's all about offers here and rules can change. On the whole, I think your site needs some Trustpilot reviews too. It's too obvious not to have a single fake review for yourself. Thank you.

comments.author: Ormosisdotcom
comments.body: Quote from: Accardo on November 16, 2022, 03:32:11 AMQuotePlease note that we do not endorse scammers or fraudsters. Our service is geared towards genuine business owners struggling with negative online reviews or not having enough reviewsThings should be balanced at some point in the cooperate world or the internet, I know it's a shady place, but not to this point, selling fake reviews and claiming to Target only genuine companies sounds really unique. Genuine companies need genuine reviews that will stick. Does your service stick on Trustpilot? Dont think so, because your site doesn't have a single review on there. However, probably, the scam and fraudulent people are your target audience and you can't resist it, because how on Earth will you detect them since you want sales too. And the only way a genuine company will need a fake review is for black hat purposes, to hunt their competitors down. Good you outruled such a service, but it's all about offers here and rules can change. On the whole, I think your site needs some Trustpilot reviews too. It's too obvious not to have a single fake review for yourself. Thank you. We only provide sticky reviews and yes, they stick on Trustpilot too. If you have any doubts, feel free to purchase using a middleman/escrow. The fact we do not have any reviews on our profile does not imply our reviews do not stick. Would you even trust such reviews if you saw? I don't think so. Instead of flooding our pages with fake reviews, we accept escrows and safe payment methods such as PayPal - as long as you are a trusted user.These false accusations are the reason why we don't usually advertise our services to the general public. Instead, we have been working in close contact with online merchants and small businesses within private groups and communities. We carefully select our customers and we do not deal with scammers.Plenty of legit businesses have purchased online reviews from us. For obvious reasons, we can not disclose the name or any other information regarding our customers. If you think that "the only way a genuine company will need a fake review is for black hat purposes", just take a look at most hosting services such as Ionos or Siteground. Do they look like real reviews to you? Majority of their positive reviews are fake and we are talking about multi-billion companies.If our services are against the rules, our sales thread will be removed. However, I see plenty of users selling stolen accounts, gift cards and other kinds of illegal products. I don't see anyone enforcing the rules against these users. My team and I provide real services that are targeted at genuine businesses. Even a new restaurant can benefit from fake reviews. We invite you to try out our services and reconsider your statements.

comments.author: Ormosisdotcom
comments.body: Quote from: MoonbetEcosystem on December 01, 2022, 01:42:08 PMDiscount please.We cannot send you a private message due to your PM requirements. Please send us a message or Bitcointalk. Alternatively, you can contact us through email or live chat and provide your Bitcointalk username. Thank you.

You can also contact us through email or live chat and provide your Bitcointalk username. Thank you.You can change your PM settings here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3517298;sa=pmprefs

comments.author: TurboBeep
comments.body: I know such practices do exist in the market but I think buying fake reviews is really unethical. I too have a business but I am not in favour of deceiving my customers with fake reviews as it may not only damage my company’s reputation but customers will also lose trust which is the last thing I would want for my business.

comments.author: logfiles

Instead, we have been working in close contact with online merchants and small businesses within private groups and communities. We carefully select our customers and we do not deal with scammers.The fake is that you provide fake reviews. That's the issue and it's not a false accusationWhy would a legit company buy fake reviews, for starters. It's only shady ones and scams that would do so because they want to create a false impression that the service is awesome.QuotePlenty of legit businesses have purchased online reviews from us. For obvious reasons, we can not disclose the name or any other information regarding our customers. The obvious reason is that you know this is an unethical and dishonest practiceQuoteIf our services are against the rules, our sales thread will be removed. However, I see plenty of users selling stolen accounts, gift cards and other kinds of illegal products. I don't see anyone enforcing the rules against these users. Scam is not moderated here, however if a scammer is identified, they will be tagged just like your account has been tagged from selling fake reviews. Identify a stolen account seller, report it in reputation or scam accusations board and see if they won't get tagged.

comments.author: ScamViruS
comments.body: Quote from: Ormosisdotcom on February 11, 2023, 07:12:03 AMEmail: hello@ormosis.comTelegram: @OrmosisBotDiscord: Ormosis#5344Live chat: ormosis.comGet a 10% discount on your first order. Simply post "DISCOUNT PLEASE" below and you will receive a PM containing your discount code.You are still doing this dirty work. And you are cheating the customers of various services. And those who buy your service have not actually come to do business, they want to cheat their customers in various ways. Because a real product does not require fake reviews, customers automatically leave positive reviews when they are satisfied with the product/service. So the buyer of your useless service will also be a dishonest person who uses shortcuts like you.
